articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen manager Xabi Alonso is wanted by Liverpool and Bayern Munich, says the latter's honorary president Uli Hoeness.
articles.title: Bayern and Liverpool 'working on Alonso deal'

articles.description: Captain Marlie Packer will win her 100th cap in England's opening game of the Women's Six Nations against Italy on Sunday.
articles.title: 100th England cap for Packer in Six Nations opener

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says there is "no transparency and no accountability" in Formula 1 as the sport continues to be rocked by off-track wrangles.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton says F1 hard to trust with no accountability in the sport

articles.description: It was only towards the end of his career that Greg Halford found there may be a deeper reason for his reluctance to mix with team-mates.
articles.title: 'I always knew I was different'

articles.description: Conor McGregor is the most drug-tested fighter in the UFC this year as he continues to tease his return.
articles.title: Conor McGregor: Irishman tested twice more than any other UFC fighter this year

articles.description: Lora and Neil Fachie and pilot Corrine Hall were "mugged" and had their silver medals stolen after the opening day of the Para-cycling Track World Championships.
articles.title: Para-cycling Track World Championships: Fachies and pilot Corrine Hall robbed of silver medals

articles.description: Newcastle forward Anthony Gordon says playing for Scotland was "never a thought" after receiving his first call-up to the senior England squad.
articles.title: Scotland 'never a thought' for England's Gordon

articles.description: George North confirms he ruptured an Achilles tendon in his final Test appearance for Wales.
articles.title: 'No fairytale end' - North has ruptured Achilles

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan is out of the World Open after a surprise defeat by Hossein Vafaei in the last 16 in China.
articles.title: World Open: Ronnie O’Sullivan beaten by Hossein Vafaei in last 16

articles.description: Wales head coach Ioan Cunningham names his matchday squad for their opening Women's Six Nations game against Scotland.
articles.title: Hesketh to make Wales debut in Six Nations opener
